Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay for one night.”
Reviews.Author: jlcarter1975
Reviews.Content: stayed flying leaving alaska cruise day stayed following weekend return flying morning deal using advanced purchase option read reviews skeptical stay prepaid didnt choice look motel pleasantly surprised okay wear clean night 20 deposit returned following morning didnt deposit stay arrange pick amtrak station werent able pick called arrival cab instead actually saved money offer 24 hour transport airport wouldnt trust travel arrangements basic nofrills stay recommend looking else look else stay

Reviews.Title: “Stains in bed when we checked in!”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed park stay package flight wouldnt standard clean walked disaster carpets stains door walls marked bathroom door cracked actually pull apart door latch bathtub pieces missing base tub looked threw rocks hundreds times check mattress hotel stay fairmont marriott hyatt etc dont care 5 hotel check bed horrible checked pillows fine pulled blankets found 3 huge stains fitted sheet stain size dvd bigger pulled blanket foot bed 2 ink stains black ink called front desk told apologized sent housemen replace knocked handed sheets walk umm dirty sheets looked helped change sheets walked shoes comforter moved floor left looked found dust looked mold air conditioner dirt needless beach towels bringing florida sleep bed didnt feel comfortable leaving car choice paid late accommodations shuttle ready bring airport 6am pulled parking lot hotel realized forgot papers reservation confirmations insurance papers car rental destination husband excuse forgot papers backthe driver punched street heard directly told husband forget annoyed hotel returned trip called shuttle 25 minutes arrived hot florida freezing cold outside stand forever dont stay dry bread cheap coffee plently options seatac park stay suggest elsewhere
